title: My character keeps rapidly shaking while i play league
body: so the game is fine and the fps are normal but my character  just keeps shaking and its playable but so fucking annoying and it made pretty angry. anyone else having this issue? ill post a vid to explain when i get in game

replies.body:
It sounds like your pc is having some issues with frame skipping, which is almost like some of the data needed to display the images is getting lost. Your champion seems like they're shaking or vibrating because the client can't reliably draw all of the images onto the screen if it's missing some of the data. 

Check out this [**guide **](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209010626-Frame-Skipping-on-High-End-PCs)for ways we can limit your fps to see if that makes things run smoother.
